name: Space-Break
description:
Space-Break:

---About---

Space-Break is an indie "Breakout" style game developed solely by Scott Zimmerman. During the game you control a paddle lost in the galaxy, rebounding a cosmic ball in order to destroy all of the bricks in the stage in order to progress.

---Important Info---

  • This game was first published on January 28, 2022 and was released on gamejolt.com on this page: Space-Break by Scott Zimmerman - Game Jolt.
  • This game is the first actual video game release that I have ever done. This was the first original video game idea that I have had, which is in terms of being solely developed and which is also not a fan game of anything else. Please excuse the lack of levels for some may come in future updates or expand in future games!

---Credits---

Game Made By: Scott Zimmerman (2022)

This game was made using Clickteam Fusion 2.5!
